Text: Well, the game works good so far with an emulator except for one thing:  On level 2 there are invisible bullets which are impossible to dodge.  I know for a fact they are supposed to be visible, but they aren't.

LlamaMaster: Go complain to the emulator developer or try a diff emu. Don't blame the rom.

Great dump. Keep it up!
